channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Supreme Court hears major challenge to campaign spending limits
item.description: As the midterm election campaign nears, the Supreme Court is deciding if legal limits on coordinated spending between parties and candidates violates ...

item.title: National Guardsman kills 3 fellow service members in Mexico
item.description: The shooting occurred hours after a car bomb exploded in Coahuayana, Michoacan, killing five people outside a local police station.

item.title: DNC chair points to 2025 wins as a map out of the wilderness heading into midterms
item.description: "I won't feel like we're out of the wilderness until we win in '28," DNC Chairman Ken Martin told CBS News in the first in a series of interviews with...

item.title: WATCH: The banjo is gaining popularity after viral video
item.description: The banjo is enjoying a resurgence in popularity, due in part to one epic player who's now going viral for her unique take on the country music staple...

item.title: A Democrat takes on Trump-backed candidate for Miami mayor in a key Hispanic battleground
7 civilians killed, thousands displaced amid Thailand-Cambodia border clashes
item.description: Tens of thousands have been displaced, Thai and Cambodian officials said.

item.title: WATCH: Made in America: David Muir tries one of Oprah's Favorite Things at Rubirosa in NYC
item.description: David Muir stops by Rubirosa's in New York City's Nolita neighborhood for a behind the scenes look at the America-made products.

item.title: Drone drops crab legs, steak and weed into notorious prison
item.description: A photo from the prison showed a raw steak, crab legs and Old Bay with side plastic baggies of marijuana and a couple of cartons of cigarettes.

item.title: Democrats see Miami mayoral race as litmus test on Trump economy, immigration
item.description: National Democrats have deployed resources for County Commissioner Eileen Higgins, while Mr. Trump has endorsed former City Manager Emilio Gonzalez.

item.title: ICE arrests of Afghans are on the rise in the wake of National Guard attack, immigration lawyers say
item.description: Immigration lawyers and authorities say arrests of Afghans are on the rise following the shooting of two National Guard members in Washington, D.C.

item.title: Democratic governors present as leaders against Trump ahead of midterms, 2028
item.description: At the Democratic Governors Association’s annual Winter meeting in Arizona, some of the brightest leaders of the party touted the "affordability" mess...

item.title: 12/8: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: President Trump blasts Marjorie Taylor Greene after her "60 Minutes" interview; Supreme Court hears arguments over firing of FTC commissioner.

item.title: Trump’s attacks on Minnesota’s Somali community cast a spotlight on fraud cases
